name: LiquityUSD Stability Pool Strategy
description: Supplies {{token}} to Liquity's Stability Pool to earn LQTY rewards and ETH (from trove liquidations). Earned tokens are harvested and sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: LiquityUSD Stability Pool Strategy
en.description: Supplies {{token}} to Liquity's Stability Pool to earn LQTY rewards and ETH (from trove liquidations). Earned tokens are harvested and sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: LiquityUSD Stability Pool Strategy
fr.description: Fournit du {{token}} sur la pool de stabilité de Liquity pour gagner des récompenses LQTY et des ETH (à partir de liquidations). Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui sont ensuite redéposés dans la stratégie.

es.name: LiquityUSD Stability Pool Strategy
es.description: Suministra {{token}} al grupo de estabilidad de Liquity para ganar recompensas LQTY y ETH (de liquidaciones de tesoros). Los tokens ganados se cosechan y venden por más {{token}} que se deposita nuevamente en la estrategia.

tr.name: LiquityUSD Stability Pool Strategy
tr.description: LQTY ödülleri ve ETH(hazinedeki tasfiyelerinden) kazanmak için Liquity'nin Stability Havuzuna {{token}} sağlar. Kazanılan jetonlar toplanır ve stratejiye geri yatırılan daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır.
